member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.CreateNewCourtCase(LSPD_First_Response.Engine.Scripting.Entities.Persona,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new court case to the court system.
member.param: LSPDFR persona of the defendant
String describing the crime committed, e.g. 'stealing a police vehicle'.
Percentage based chance of the suspect being found guilty. 100 = always guilty, 0 = never guilty.
The decision the court will come to, e.g. 'Sentenced to 5 months in prison'

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.CreateNewCourtCase(LSPD_First_Response.Engine.Scripting.Entities.Persona,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a new court case to the court system (this overload is recommended only for debugging by setting an instant publish time).
member.param: LSPDFR persona of the defendant
String describing the crime committed, e.g. 'stealing a police vehicle'.
Percentage based chance of the suspect being found guilty. 100 = always guilty, 0 = never guilty.
The decision the court will come to, e.g. 'Sentenced to 5 months in prison'
The DateTime when the results will become available to the player (use not recommended in release builds).

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.DeterminePrisonSentence(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a court verdict for a prison sentence depending on the parameters.
member.param: Percentage based chance of the sentence being suspended. 100 = always suspended, 0 = never suspended.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.DetermineFineSentence(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a court verdict for a fine depending on the parameters.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.AddQuestionToTrafficStop(Rage.Ped,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a custom question to the traffic stop questioning section.
member.param: The ped for whom the question should appear (must have this ped stopped for the question to appear).

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.AddQuestionToTrafficStop(Rage.Ped,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a custom question to the traffic stop questioning section.
member.param: The ped for whom the question should appear (must have this ped stopped for the question to appear).
A list of possible answers. A random one will be selected.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.AddQuestionToTrafficStop(Rage.Ped,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a custom question to the traffic stop questioning section.
member.param: The ped for whom the question should appear (must have this ped stopped for the question to appear).
A list of possible questions. A random one will be selected.
A list of possible answers. A random one will be selected.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.AddQuestionToTrafficStop(Rage.Ped,System.String,System.Func{Rage.Ped,System.String})
member.summary: Adds a custom question to the traffic stop questioning section.
member.param: The ped for whom the question should appear (must have this ped stopped for the question to appear).
The function passed will be called when the question is asked. The suspect will be passed to the function. It must return a string, which will be used as an answer.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.AddQuestionToTrafficStop(Rage.Ped,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Action{Rage.Ped,System.String})
member.summary: Adds a custom question to the traffic stop questioning section.
member.param: The ped for whom the question should appear (must have this ped stopped for the question to appear).
A list of possible answers. A random one will be selected.
The function passed will be called when the question is asked. The suspect and the chosen answer will be passed to the function as parameters.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.HideStandardTrafficStopQuestions(Rage.Ped,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hides the standard traffic stop questions for the specified ped.
member.param: Traffic stop questions will be hidden if this ped is the current suspect.
If true, hides standard questions. If false, shows standard questions.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.ResetTrafficStopQuestions(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Resets the traffic stop questions to default for the specified suspect.

member.name: E:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.PedOrderedOutOfVehicle
member.summary: Raised whenever the player orders a ped out of a vehicle on a traffic stop.

member.name: E:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.TrafficStopInitiated
member.summary: Raised whenever the player initiates a traffic stop on a suspect.

member.name: E:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.PlayerJoinedActivePursuit
member.summary: Raised whenever the player joins a pursuit that's active.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.GetCurrentPursuitTactics
member.summary: Returns the current pursuit tactic.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.Functions.ArePursuitTacticsAutomatic
member.summary: Returns true if automatic tactics are enabled for pursuits, and false if not.

member.name: T:LSPDFR_.API.ProtectedFunctions
member.summary: These functions require verification with me (Albo1125) beforehand to ensure fairness. To get verified, please contact me.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.ProtectedFunctions.AddCountToStatistic(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Increases the specified statistic by one.
member.param: Use GenerateSecurityGuid().
The statistic to increase.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.ProtectedFunctions.AddCountToStatistic(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Increases the specified statistic by one.
member.param: The name of your plugin.
The statistic to increase.

member.name: M:LSPDFR_.API.ProtectedFunctions.GenerateSecurityGuid(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If Signature matches with the passed ExecutingAssembly, PluginName and AuthorName, returns a security Guid to allow use of this class's functions.
member.param: Pass the following: System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly()
Exact PluginName as agreed between you and me.
Exact AuthorName as agreed between you and me.
The Signature as you obtained from me.
member.returns: If verification is successful, returns a security Guid. If unsuccessful, returns an empty Guid.
